Standard_Text: Analyze, compare, create, and compose shapes.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Correctly name shapes.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Describe the relative positions of these objects using terms such as above, below, beside, in front of, behind, and
next to.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Describe objects in the environment using names of shapes.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Geometry: Identify and describe shapes (squares, circles, triangles, rectangles, hexagons).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Classify objects into given categories; count the numbers of objects in each category and sort the categories
by count.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Directly compare two objects with a measurable attribute in common, to see which object has “more of / less
of” the attribute, and describe the difference. For example, directly compare the heights of two children and
describe one child as taller / shorter.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Describe measurable attributes of objects, such as length or weight.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Measurement and Data
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Decompose numbers into pairs in more than one way.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Solve addition and subtraction word problems, and add and subtract, e.g., by using objects or drawings to
represent the problem.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Represent addition and subtraction with objects, fingers, mental images, drawings, sounds, (e.g., claps),
acting out situations, verbal explanations.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Operations and Algebraic Thinking: Understand addition as putting together and adding to, and understand subtraction as talking apart and taking from.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Compare numbers. Identify whether the number of objects in one group is greater than, less than, or equal
to the number of objects in another group, e.g., by using matching and counting strategies.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Count to answer “how many?” questions about things arranged in a line, a rectangle array, or a circle, things
in a scattered configuration; given a number count out that many objects.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Understand that each successive number name refers to a quantity that is one larger.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Understand that the last number name said tells the number of objects counted. The number of objects is the
same regardless of their arrangement or the order in which they were counted.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
When counting objects, say the number names in the standard order, pairing each object with one and only one
number name and each number name with one and only one object.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Count to tell the number of objects. Understand the relationship between numbers and quantities; connect
counting to cardinality.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Write numbers from 0 – 20 (with 0 representing a count of no objects).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Count forward beginning from a given number within the known sequence (instead of having to begin at 1).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Count by tens.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Count by ones.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Know number names and the count sequence.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Counting and Cardinality
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Standards of Mathematical Practices
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Use a combination of drawing, dictating, and writing to narrate a single event or several loosely linked
events.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Use a combination of drawing, dictating, and writing to compose informative / explanatory texts in which they
name what they are writing about and supply some information about the topic.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Use a combination of drawing, dictating, and writing to compose opinion pieces in which they state and
opinion or preference.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Text Types and Purposes
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Writing
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Use illustrations and context to make predictions about text.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Actively engage in group reading activities with purpose and understanding.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Name the author and illustrator of a text and define the role of each in presenting the ideas or
information in a text.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Identify the front cover, back cover, and title page of a book.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: With prompting and support, identify the main topic of a text.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: With prompting and support answer questions about text.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Reading Standards for Informational Text
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Use illustrations and context to make predictions about text.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Activate prior knowledge related to the information and events in texts.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Actively engage in group reading activities with purpose and understanding.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: With prompting and support, compare and contrast the characters in familiar stories.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
With prompting and support, describe illustrations and the story in which they appear (e.g., what moment in
a story and illustration depicts).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
With prompting and support, name the author and illustrator of a story and define the role of each in telling
the story.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: With prompting and support, identify characters, settings, and major events.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: With prompting and support, retell familiar stories including key details.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: With prompting and support answer questions about details in a text.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Reading Standards for Literature
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Read common high-frequency words by sight. (District determines)
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Associate short sounds with common spellings (graphemes) for the five major vowels.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Demonstrate basic knowledge of one-to-one letter-sound correspondences by producing the primary sounds for
each consonant.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Know and apply grade-level phonics and word analysis skills in decoding words both in isolation and
in text.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Phonics and Word Recognition
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Isolate and pronounce the initial final sounds (phonemes) in three-phoneme (CVC) words. This does not include
CVC’s ending with /l/, /r/ or /x/).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Blend two or three phonemes into recognizable words.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Blend and segment onsets and rimes of single-syllable spoken words.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Count, pronounce, blend, and segment syllables in spoken words.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Recognize rhyming words.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Demonstrate understanding of spoken words, syllables, and sounds (phonemes).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Phonological Awareness
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Recognize and name upper and lower case letters of the alphabet.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Understand that words are separated by spaces in print.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Recognize that spoken words are represented in written language by specific sequences of letters.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Follow words from left to right, top to bottom, and page by page.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Demonstrate understanding of the organization and basic features of print.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Print Concepts
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Reading Standards: Foundational Skills
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Indentify real-life connections between words and their use (e.g., note places at school that are colorful).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Demonstrate understanding of frequently occurring adjectives by relating them to their opposites (antonyms).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Sort common objects into categories (e.g., shapes, foods) to gain a sense of the concepts the categories
represent.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: With guidance and support from adults, explore word relationships and nuances in word meanings.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Use the most frequently occurring inflections and affixes (e.g., -ed, -s).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Indentify new meanings for familiar words.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
– Determine or clarify the meaning of unknown and multiple-meaning words and phrases based on
kindergarten reading and content.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Vocabulary Acquisition and Use
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Spell simple words phonetically drawing on knowledge of sound-letter relationships.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Write letter or letters for most consonants.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Recognize name and punctuation.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Capitalize the first word in a sentence and the pronoun I.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English capitalization, punctuation, and spelling when
writing.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Produce and expand complete sentences in shared language activities.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Use the most frequently occurring prepositions (e.g., to, from, in, out, on, off, for, of, by, with).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Understand and use question words (interrogatives) (e.g., who, what, where, when, why, how).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Form regular plural nouns orally by adding /s/ or /es/ (e.g., dog, dogs; wish, wishes).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Use frequently occurring nouns and verbs.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Print many uppercase and lowercase letters.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Demonstrate command of the conventions of standard English grammar and usage when speaking.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Conventions of Standard English
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Language Standards
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Speak audibly and express thoughts, feelings, and ideas clearly.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Add drawings or other visual displays to descriptions as desired to provide additional detail.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Describe familiar people, places, things, and events.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Ask and answer questions in order to seek help, get information, or clarify something that is not
understood.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Understand and follow one step oral directions.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Confirm understanding of a text read aloud or information presented orally or through other media by
answering questions about key details and requesting clarification if something is not understood.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Follow agreed-upon rules for discussions (e.g. listening to others and taking turns speaking about the topics and
texts under discussion).
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text:
Participate in collaborative conversations with diverse partners about kindergarten topics and texts with
peers and adults in small and larger groups.
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Comprehension and Collaboration
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)

Standard_Text: Speaking & Listening Standards
Subject: Transitional Kindergarten California Common Core Standards (CCCS)
